description: The system has lowered the battery charge voltage in order to discharge the batteries
to a predefined level. When the criteria for stopping the battery testing is reached, the
charge voltage is increased to commence normal charging.
The system has lowered the battery charge voltage in order to discharge the batteries
to a predefined level. When the criteria for stopping the battery testing is reached, the
charge voltage is increased to commence normal charging.
variables.name: ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::alarmBatteryTestmodeEntered

description: The number of times a trap has been repeated.. Only acessible for Traps.
variables.name: ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::systemTrapCounter

description: The system has increased the battery charge voltage in order to boost the
battery. When the criteria for stopping the battery boost is reached,
the charge voltage is lowered to commence normal charging.
The system has increased the battery charge voltage in order to boost the
battery. When the criteria for stopping the battery boost is reached,
the charge voltage is lowered to commence normal charging.
variables.name: ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::alarmBatteryBoostmodeEntered

description: Programmable input alarm for Control unit 1.
Programmable input alarms will have description attached that explains the alarm.
Default description is: ProgInput <Control unit ID>.x.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::alarmController1proginputTrap ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::inputUserConfigurable1 i 1 ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::systemTrapCounter c 9999 ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::systemLastDigInput i 1 ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::inputUserConfigurableText1 s EXAMPLE

variables.name: ELTEK-DISTRIBUTED-MIB::systemLastDigInput

description: Programmable input alarms will have description attached that explains the alarm.
